items.title: Cappadocia Rug
items.description_html:
SKU: 16390

Material: Wool pile; cotton foundation (fringes cotton)

Dyes: Natural vegetable & root dyes

Eco‑Friendly: Low‑impact, sustainably dyed

Hand‑knotted Cappadocia (Kapadokya) rug — traditional Anatolian craftsmanship with balanced patterns and durable construction; ideal for living spaces seeking both character and longevity.

Size: 3' 0'' X 4' 3''
Origin: Turkey
